# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/jest`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Jest (http://facebook.github.io/jest/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/jest

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 29 Jan 2018 21:19:39 GMT
 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: afterAll, afterEach, beforeAll, beforeEach, describe, expect, fdescribe, fit, it, jasmine, jest, test, xdescribe, xit, xtest
